H0.text: Which Beatles offering was first shown on British TV on Boxing Day 1967. A Hard Day's Night

H1.text: Which Beatles offering was first shown on British TV on Boxing Day 1967. Help!

H2.text: Which Beatles offering was first shown on British TV on Boxing Day 1967. Yellow Submarine

H3.text: Which Beatles offering was first shown on British TV on Boxing Day 1967. Magical mystery tour

A4.text: The Beatles film 'Magical Mystery Tour' was screened on Boxing Day 1967 in Britain.

A5.text: The film was screened on Boxing Day in Britain to an audience estimated at 15 million.
